item.title: My Setup
item.description: AirPlay Starting with MacOS Monterey (2021), you can now use AirPlay to directly stream audio from your iPhone to your MacBook.

item.title: Posts to Obsidian Forum
item.description: Posts to Obsidian Forum Bulk Changes to YAML For members who may be looking to edit YAML as a Database or Table-like view, Obsidian DB Folder has been a helpful extension for me to see YAML of files in a folder in a Notion-Like database.
